author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/ac-helpers/find_apr.m4: Update to latest APR version.

author: rooneg
msg: Remove this, since people feel it is better to keep our feature set the same
across all the platforms we support.

author: rooneg
msg: Sync with the changes that have been committed to the version of this port
Add the patch to enable http proxy support, since the 'http_proxy' env
variable is the appropriate way to do this under FreeBSD anyway, so there
doesn't seem to be much point in waiting for a more cross platform fix for

author: rooneg
msg: Some minor updates to the Subversion FreeBSD port.
don't call patch ourself, let the ports system do it.  delete the apr and
apr-util subdirs as well as the neon one, to keep subversion's build system
so that the ports makefiles will pick it up and patch it for us.
